description: The Astilbe Arendsii Astary Pink is a stunning addition to any garden. This deciduous perennial is low maintenance and easy to grow, blooming in late spring. Its glorious, deep fuchsia-pink flowers emerge atop foliage that is an attractive dark green. Astilbes make excellent cut flowers, and benefit from deadheading, as this will extend the bloom time and may even lead to a reblooming! Astilbe Arendsii Astary Pink can also help attract pollinators to your garden. The foliage will even remain a beautiful shade of green during the winter months. Plant it in areas with moist soil and, in return, enjoy its majestic beauty in your garden for years to come!
